title.narrative: Support for Forest Related Micro, Small, and Medium-sized Enterprises (MSMEs) in Ejidos

description.narrative: Provide access to financial and technical assistance to Mexican community forest enterprises working to preserve the natural capital of forest lands in Oaxaca, Yucatan, Quintana Roo, Jalisco, and Campeche

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
